event_text: m_c was grabbed and dropped by a vulture, but they somehow survived.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred when a vulture grabbed them.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after a vulture grabbed them.

event_text: m_c thought they were walking on a snowdrift till it gave way and they fell down the structure, breaking their leg.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred when they fell through a snowdrift and down the structure.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after falling down the structure.

event_text: m_c fell from a pole and somehow survived, though not without breaking their leg.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred when they fell off a pole.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after falling off a pole.

event_text: m_c was climbing a pole when they fell. Luckily, they were only bruised by the incident.
m_c was pushing through some dense shrubs and felt the branches tear painfully at their pelt.
m_c survived a vicious vulture attack - with the claw marks to prove it!

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred by an vulture.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after fighting an vulture.

event_text: m_c was climbing a pole and got a nail in their paw from one of the loose nails.
m_c was moving some branches out of the way when they got a splinter.
m_c was out wandering the territory for a bit too long and came back with frostbite.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died after they got frostbite.

event_text: m_c fell into a river, and inhaled a lot of water before managing to get out. They've been hacking and sputtering ever since.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from water-inhalation after falling in the river.

event_text: m_c's tail was badly injured by falling rocks.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred by falling rocks.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after rocks fell on them.
